title: Shimano Ultread updates lighter, more durable XC, AM and Gravity MTB Shoes
content:
Shimano has overhauled their range of mountain bike shoes, introducing three new models for XC, two for All-Mountain, and one for Gravity riding. Central to the updates is Shimano’s new proprietary Ultread rubber compound that replaces the Michelin soles of past iterations.
